description: Try our easy to follow Pork Mignons with Roasted Pumpkin & Spinach Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pork chop,High protein,Roast,Seafood free,Low salt,Wheat free,Egg free,Pork,Pumpkin,Spinach
name: Pork Mignons with Roasted Pumpkin & Spinach Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a large baking tray with baking paper.
Cut pumpkin into 3cm pieces and put onto prepared tray. Spray with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Roast for 25-30 minutes or until tender. Cool.
Place spinach and walnuts into a bowl. Combine balsamic vinegar, extra virgin olive oil and honey in a jug. Season with salt and pepper. Add pumpkin and dressing to salad just before serving.
Place pork onto a baking tray lined with baking paper. Cook in oven for 20 minutes, as per packet instructions or until cooked through. Serve pork with pumpkin salad.
